item.title: Node-RED to LINE Bot Part 1 [英語版]
item.description: Attention This is an archive of the articles below ;) https://dev.to/iganari/try-push-line-bot-from-node-red-part-1-52f6 Try push LINE Bot From Node-RED Part.1 Goal Refer to the following article, I try push LINE Bot From Node-RED. Raspberry Pi やローカルPC で動かす Node-RED で Line Bot の Push メッセージを送るメモ https://www.1ft-seabass.jp/memo/2020/01/03/local-node-red-linebot-push-message/ Split the article into several pieces, because the contents is long. Set up Raspberry Pi I use raspberry Pi 3 Model B what was used in the past.
